column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Aang , I 'm trying to be mature and not immediately shoot down your idea , but it sounds ... really terrible . "
#Text=Toph says : " Yeah , we got our outfits .
#Text=I already have a picture of Fire Lord Ozai .
#Text=And here 's one that I made out of noodles !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Impressive , I admit , but I still think it 's too dangerous .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess we 'll never find out about the secret river then .
#Text=It goes right to the Fire Lord 's palace .
#Text=We were supposed to learn about it in class tomorrow .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hmm , I am a fan of secret rivers ... fine , let 's stay a few more days .
#Text=" Aang says : " Flamey - O , hotman !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Flamey - O ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " You brought this on yourself you know .
#Text=We could have returned together .
#Text=You could have been a hero !
#Text=You have no right to judge me , Uncle .
#Text=I did what I had to do in Ba Sing Se , and you 're a fool for not joining me .
#Text=You 're not going to say anything ?
#Text=You 're a crazy old man !
#Text=You 're crazy !
#Text=And if you were n't in jail , you 'd be sleeping in a gutter !
#Text="
